meanings.definition: A large body of water surrounded by land.
meanings.sent1: The beautiful lakes reflected the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent2: We went fishing at the lakes over the weekend.
meanings.sent3: The ducks at the lakes seemed to be having a meeting.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like tranquil lakes, deep and mysterious.
meanings.sent5: The lakes shimmered in the sunlight, inviting us to swim.

meanings.definition: To form or deposit in a lake.
meanings.sent1: We will lakes the excess rainwater in the reservoir.
meanings.sent2: The heavy rain will lakes in the low-lying areas.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally lakes his keys in the puddle.
meanings.sent4: The artist will lakes the colors on the canvas to create a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The chef will lakes the sauce over the dish for added flavor.
